aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.intro: My name is Camila Fernandes. I am an accomplished graphic designer with {{years}} years of experience, specializing in motion graphics and video editing. I have successfully worked as a freelancer, collaborating with clients across Europe, the United States, and Brazil. My diverse experience as a graphic designer includes creating art, animations, and titles for television advertisements and social media campaigns. As a video editor, I have contributed to prominent corporate videos and YouTube channels.
aboutMe.personalNote: On a personal note, I am a geek who loves the entertainment industry, ranging from books and mangas to movies and TV series. I also enjoy some games, although I wouldn't consider myself a hardcore player. I love anything that involves creativity, fantasy, and art.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Below you'll find some of the work I've done until now. Feel free to look and don't hesitate to contact me if you need something else.

carousel.title: Some of the companies I worked with

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You can contact me via WhatsApp, Email and LinkedIn below. I'll be happy to help you with your project.
